original_text: So the city was filled with the confusion, and they rushed together into the theater, dragging with them Gaius and Aristarchus, Macedonians who were Paul's companions in travel.
korean_text: 온 시내가 요란하여 바울과 같이 다니는 마게도냐 사람 가이오와 아리스다고를 붙들어 일제히 연극장으로 달려 들어가는지라

sentences.original_text: So the city was filled with the confusion
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 온 성은 혼란에 가득 찼고

sentences.original_text: and they rushed together into the theater
dragging with them Gaius and Aristarchus
Macedonians who were Paul's companions in travel
